item.title: Events
item.description: I’m currently working as a Digital Marketing & Event Management Trainee at CERN in Geneva, a role I’ve held since July 2023. My primary responsibilities are preparing and promoting the International Cryogenic Engineering Conference 2024. In my day-to-day, I’m deeply involved in creating, positioning, and maintaining the conference’s website and various online platforms. Additionally, I manage the registration and payment processes for international visitors, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for participants from around the world.

item.title: Graphics
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. :zap: Emoji Support The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes. To enable emoji globally, set enableEmoji to true in your site’s configuration and then you can type emoji shorthand codes directly in content files; e.g. The Emoji cheat sheet is a useful reference for emoji shorthand codes. N.B. The above steps enable Unicode Standard emoji characters and sequences in Hugo, however the rendering of these glyphs depends on the browser and the platform.

item.title: Affiliate Marketing
item.description: During my time as a Junior e-Marketing Specialist in Cloud Services, I ran marketing campaigns for e-commerce and financial clients like iDream, Allegro, Cineman, Pekao S.A., PKO BP, and Alior Bank. My main job was to build and manage the affiliate marketing network to improve results and revenue. This meant partnering with other websites to boost our sales. Among other things I was cooperating with PAYBACK. I spent a lot of time shaping how our clients appeared online using our advertising spaces (like KOKOS, Autopay, Bluepartner Smart) and external platforms.
